Html: Does anyone know of any graph rendering option besides the (not for commercial use) GLEE or the (very un-dot-net) GraphViz?
I don't know any. You can now buy licenses of GLEE on Windows Market place (MSAGL). I will update the wiki soon.

The Netron Project is an excellent way of rendering nodes and tree strucures...
http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=69788
